data.text: Koma mu nhyehyɛe yɛ onipa de,
Ɛyɛ onipa sɛ nʼakwan nyinaa yɛ kronkron,
Fa nea woyɛ nyinaa hyɛ Awurade nsam,
Awurade yɛ biribiara ma nʼankasa botae,
Awurade kyi koma mu ahantanfo nyinaa.
Wɔnam ɔdɔ ne nokware so pata bɔne;
Sɛ onipa akwan sɔ Awurade ani a,
Kakraa bi a wɔnam trenee kwan so nya no ye
Onipa yɛ ne nhyehyɛe wɔ ne koma mu,
Ɔhene anom kasa te sɛ nkɔmhyɛ,
Nsania ne abrammo a asisi nni mu fi Awurade;
Ahemfo kyi bɔneyɛ,
Ahemfo ani sɔ ano a ɛka nokware;
Ɔhene abufuwhyew yɛ owu somafo,
Sɛ ɔhene anim tew a, ɛyɛ nkwa,
Eye sɛ wubenya nyansa sen sɛ wubenya sikakɔkɔɔ,
Ɔtreneeni tempɔn kwati bɔne;
Ahantan di ɔsɛe anim,
Eye sɛ wobɛyɛ honhom mu hiani wɔ wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so mu
Nea ɔyɛ osetie ma nkyerɛkyerɛ no nya nkɔso;
Wɔfrɛ koma mu anyansafo se nhumufo,
Ntease yɛ nkwa asuti ma wɔn a wɔwɔ bi,
Onyansafo koma kyerɛ nʼano kwan,
Abodwosɛm te sɛ ɛwokyɛm;
Ɔkwan bi wɔ hɔ a ɛteɛ wɔ onipa ani so,
Apaafo akɔnnɔ ma wɔyɛ adwumaden;
Ohuhuni bɔ pɔw bɔne,
Onipa kɔntɔnkye de mpaapaemu ba,
Kitikitiyɛni daadaa ne yɔnko,
Nea obu nʼani no redwene bɔneyɛ ho;
Dwen yɛ anuonyam abotiri;
Nea ɔwɔ abodwokyɛre no ye sen ɔkofo,
Wɔbɔ ntonto de hwehwɛ nea Awurade pɛ,
